edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random

Class HardEMRandOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random.HardEMRandOM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class HardEMRandOM
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelApplication
    Learns new weights for the CompatibilityKernels in a Model using hard EM RandOM learning.

      • REASONER_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String REASONER_KEY
        Key for Factory or String property.

        Should be set to a ReasonerFactory or the fully qualified name of one. Will be used to instantiate a Reasoner.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REASONER_DEFAULT

        public static final ReasonerFactory REASONER_DEFAULT

        Value is instance of ADMMReasonerFactory.

      • learn

        public void learn()
           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                  java.lang.InstantiationException

        The RandomVariableAtoms in the distribution are those persisted in the Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.

        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        See Also:
        DatabasePopulator
